name: COLOR EXPLODE 3D: RUSH & BUMP
description:
This is a bumping runner with various levels where you control a ball that can bump into objects of different shapes.

You need to bump the objects of the same colors and push them into the ones of a different color. The ones of a different color explode when touched, be careful not to touch them with the ball directly cause it will decrease your shield! 

Reach the finish line without losing all your shield!
